modShortDescription: This 7DTD mod adds some helper blocks. This mod also allows you to pick up the light fixtures in the world and converts them to the helper block.
modDescription:
This 7DTD mod adds some helper blocks.

**Helper block that adds:**

* All in game lights fixtures
* All require power

This mod also allows you to pick up the [light](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-lights/) fixtures in the world and converts them to the helper block.

You can either craft the helper at the workbench or use the ones found in the world.

All items scrap to broken glass.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1Af2hUYA21aNdkELHDmudIblK1Lbc9X6r)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16356-two-electricity-helper-blocks-fuse-boxes-and-lights/).

**Credits:** [Shinoma](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shinoma/)
